#load packages.
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(qiime2R) # A package for importing qiime2 artifacts. 
library(microbiome) # for data analysis and visualisation.
library(DT)
library(data.table)
library(ggpubr)
library(R2PPT)
library(RDCOMClient)
library(png)
library(vegan)
library(DESeq2)
library(viridis)

```

#convert the qiime artifacts to phyloseq object.
```{r}
#important information needed:features, tree,& #metadata.
phy_ww <- qza_to_phyloseq( 
  features = "filtered_table.qza",
  tree = "insertion-tree.qza","taxonomy.qza",
  metadata = "metaWW.tsv")

```


```{r}
phy_ww
```


```{r}
#inspect the sample reads.

summary(sample_sums(phy_ww))

```


```{r}
set.seed(9242)# This will help in reproducing the filtering and nomalisation.
phy_ww_rar <- rarefy_even_depth(phy_ww, sample.size = 4896)
```

```{r}
table(tax_table(phy_ww_rar)[, "Phylum"], exclude = NULL)
```

```{r}
#if any phylum has only one feature, consider filtering out.

p_ww <- subset_taxa(phy_ww_rar, !is.na(Phylum) & !Phylum %in% c("", "NA", "Nitrospirota", "Dependentiae", "Elusimicrobiota", "Acidobacteriota"))
p_ww
```

```{r}
#compute the prevalence of each OTU and store in a dataframe.
prevdf_ww <- apply(X = otu_table(p_ww),
               MARGIN = ifelse(taxa_are_rows(p_ww), yes = 1, no = 2),
               FUN = function(OTU){sum(OTU > 0)})
```


```{r}
#Add taxonomy and total read counts to this dataframe.

prevdf_ww <- data.frame(Prevalence = prevdf_ww,
                    TotalAbundance = taxa_sums(p_ww),
                    tax_table(p_ww))
```

```{r}
#Define prevalence threshold as 1% of total samples
prevalenceThreshold <- 0.001 * nsamples(p_ww)


```


```{r}
#execute the prevalence filter using the prune_taxa() function.

kiipTaxa <- rownames(prevdf_ww)[(prevdf_ww$Prevalence >= prevalenceThreshold)]
ww_filt <- prune_taxa(kiipTaxa, p_ww)
ww_filt
```


```{r}
merge_less_than_top_ww <- function(ww_filt, top = 10) {transformed <- transform_sample_counts(ww_filt, function(OTU) OTU/sum(OTU))
otu.table <- as.data.frame(otu_table(transformed))
otu.sort <- otu.table[order(rowMeans(otu.table), decreasing = TRUE),]

otu.list <- row.names(otu.sort[(top + 1):nrow(otu.sort),])
merged <- merge_taxa(transformed, otu.list, 1)
for(i in 1:dim(tax_table(merged))[1]){
  if (is.na(tax_table(merged)[i,2])){
    taxa_names(merged)[i] <- "Other"
    tax_table(merged)[i, 1:6] <- "Other" 
  }
}
  return(merged)
}
```





```{r}
ww_gen <-tax_glom(ww_filt, "Genus")
```


```{r}
ww_gen_top10 <- merge_less_than_top_ww(ww_gen, top = 10)

```


```{r}
#convert into a dataframe.
tax_rel_abun_ww_gen_top10 <-psmelt(ww_gen_top10)%>%
  filter(Abundance > 0.001) %>%
  arrange(Genus)

```

```{r}
ww <- ggplot(
  tax_rel_abun_ww_gen_top10, aes(x = Day, y = Abundance, fill = Genus)
)+
  facet_grid(~Genotype*Treatment, scales = "free")+
  geom_bar(stat = "identity", position = "fill")+
  labs(x="Day", y="Rel. Abun", title = "Genus relative abundance") +
   theme(
    axis.text.x = element_text(size = 10, 
    angle = 90, vjust = 0.5, hjust = 1),
    axis.text.y = element_text(size = 8),
    legend.text = element_text(size = 8),
    strip.text = element_text(size = 8)
  )
```

```{r}
ww
```

```{r}
#beta-diversity metrics: Non-phylogenetic beta diversity.

dist_ww <- phyloseq::distance(
phy_ww_rar, method = "bray")
ordination <- ordinate(phy_ww_rar, method = "PCoA",
                       distance = dist_ww)
b.div.bray_ww <-plot_ordination(phy_ww_rar, ordination,type = "samples", shape = "Treatment", color = "Genotype", title = "PCoA; taxa(Genus)")+
  scale_color_manual(values = c("LR2_36_1" ="black", "LRV_0_1" ="red", "LRV_12_3" ="blue" , "LRV_8-5_3" ="green")) +
  geom_point(aes(color = "grey90"), alpha = 0.7, size = 3.5)
```

```{r}
print(b.div.bray_ww)
```


```{r}
#Phylogenetic beta diversity metrics.

ww_rel <- microbiome::transform(phy_ww, "compositional") # first transform the phyloseq object
```


```{r}
p.ord.wuni <- ordinate(ww_rel, "PCoA", "unifrac", weighted = T)
```

```{r}
b.div.wuni <- plot_ordination(ww_rel, p.ord.wuni, type = "samples", color = "Genotype", title = "PCoA; taxa(Genus)")+
  geom_point( size = 3.5)
```

```{r}
print(b.div.wuni)
```


```{r}
#Permanova

otu <- abundances(ww_rel)
meta <- meta(ww_rel)

```


```{r}
permanova_ww <-
adonis2(t(otu)~Treatment*Day*Genotype+(1/Genotype/Replicates), data = meta, strata = meta$Replicates, permutations = 99, method = "bray")
```

```{r}
permanova_ww
```

```{r}
capture.output(permanova_ww, file = "permanova.txt")

```
